parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. If unset, the version will be defaulted to 16.4.3. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: VrfContext object creation
parameters.name: body

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. If unset, the version will be defaulted to 16.4.3. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.name: uuid

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid
parameters.name: refers_to

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid
parameters.name: referred_by

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: Filter to get objects that belongs to a specific cloud using its uuid. Eg. cloud_uuid=cloud-xyz.
parameters.name: cloud_uuid

parameters.description: Filter to get objects that belongs to a specific cloud usings its name. This uses cloud name rather than uuid. Eg. cloud_ref.name=Default-Cloud.
parameters.name: cloud_ref.name

keepalive_interval.description: Keepalive interval for Peers. Allowed values are 0-3600.

ip_communities.description: Communities per IP address range. Field introduced in 17.1.3.

local_as.description: Local Autonomous System ID. Allowed values are 1-4294967295.

community.description: Community string either in aa nn format where aa, nn is within [1,65535] or local-AS|no-advertise|no-export|internet. Field introduced in 17.1.2.

send_community.description: Send community attribute to all peers. Field introduced in 17.1.2.

hold_time.description: Hold time for Peers. Allowed values are 3-7200.

description.description: User defined description for the object.

static_routes.description: Placeholder for description of property static_routes of obj type VrfContext field type str  type object

cloud_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Cloud.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type Tenant.

system_default.description: Placeholder for description of property system_default of obj type VrfContext field type str  type boolean

gateway_mon.description: Configure ping based heartbeat check for gateway in service engines of vrf.

internal_gateway_monitor.description: Configure ping based heartbeat check for all default gateways in service engines of vrf. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

debugvrfcontext.description: Configure debug flags for VRF. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

uuid.description: Unique object identifier of the object.

keepalive_interval.description: Keepalive interval for this Peer. Allowed values are 0-3600.

remote_as.description: Peer Autonomous System ID. Allowed values are 1-4294967295.

ebgp_multihop.description: TTL for multihop ebgp Peer. Allowed values are 0-255. Field introduced in 17.1.3.

bfd.description: Enable Bi-Directional Forward Detection. Only async mode supported.

advertise_snat_ip.description: Advertise SNAT IP to this Peer.

local_as.description: Local AS to use for this ebgp peer. If specified, this will override the local AS configured at the VRF level. Allowed values are 1-4294967295. Field introduced in 17.1.6,17.2.2.

connect_timer.description: Connect timer for this Peer. Allowed values are 1-120.

md5_secret.description: Peer Autonomous System Md5 Digest Secret Key.

advertisement_interval.description: Advertisement interval for this Peer. Allowed values are 1-60.

network_ref.description: Network providing reachability for Peer. It is a reference to an object of type Network.

peer_ip.description: IP Address of the BGP Peer.

hold_time.description: Hold time for this Peer. Allowed values are 3-7200.

ip_addr.description: Placeholder for description of property ip_addr of obj type IpAddrPrefix field type str  type object

gateway_monitor_success_threshold.description: The number of consecutive successful gateway health checks before a gateway that was marked down by the gateway monitor is marked up. Allowed values are 3-50. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

gateway_monitor_failure_threshold.description: The number of consecutive failed gateway health checks before a gateway is marked down. Allowed values are 3-50. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

disable_gateway_monitor.description: Disable the gateway monitor for default gateway. They are monitored by default. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

gateway_monitor_interval.description: The interval between two ping requests sent by the gateway monitor in milliseconds. If a value is not specified, requests are sent every second. Allowed values are 100-60000. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

gateway_monitor_success_threshold.description: The number of consecutive successful gateway health checks before a gateway that was marked down by the gateway monitor is marked up. Allowed values are 3-50.

gateway_ip.description: IP address of next hop gateway to be monitored.

gateway_monitor_fail_threshold.description: The number of consecutive failed gateway health checks before a gateway is marked down. Allowed values are 3-50.

gateway_monitor_interval.description: The interval between two ping requests sent by the gateway monitor in milliseconds. If a value is not specified, requests are sent every second. Allowed values are 100-60000.

ip_end.description: End of IP address range. Optional if ip_begin is the only IP address in specified IP range. Field introduced in 17.1.3.

ip_begin.description: Beginning of IP address range. Field introduced in 17.1.3.

community.description: Community string either in aa nn format where aa, nn is within [1,65535] or local-AS|no-advertise|no-export|internet. Field introduced in 17.1.3.

prefix.description: Placeholder for description of property prefix of obj type StaticRoute field type str  type object

next_hop.description: Placeholder for description of property next_hop of obj type StaticRoute field type str  type object

disable_gateway_monitor.description: Disable the gateway monitor for default gateway. They are monitored by default. Field introduced in 17.1.1.

flag.description: Enum options - DEBUG_VRF_BGP, DEBUG_VRF_ALL, DEBUG_VRF_NONE. Field introduced in 17.1.1.
